title: HURL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 30 Apprentice Posts
description: The Hindustan Urvarak & Rasayan Limited (HURL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 30 Technician Apprentice Trainee, Trade Apprentice Trainee Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Mechanical, Civil, and Electrical Engineering can apply for the HURL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
